body:
Project: mplsviewer
Author: Aki Hermann Barkarson, CCIE # 27552

Latest version: 0.5b

New features:

* Some basic regexp search capability in search
* VRF parser fixed for definition route-targets not under address-family
* view-one-vrf.php updated for ipv4 only, ipv6 only and ipv4/ipv6.


Go to 'Downloads' for the latest release.
Installation instructions are in the Wiki section.

Next up;
Add ipv6 support for view-one-device.php.
Add HD vrf support to parser.
Add HD vrf view to seperate viewer or add it to the others, still conflicted about how to solve this.
Add rancid path array to config.php.
Stop using silly shell commands in parser, read to php and work it over there.
Move redundant code to functions.
Add css support.
Add RD values again, neatly(removed it in 0.4b).
More..
tagline: View mpls enabled devices, vrfs and their import/export viewer. (rancid parsed to mysql with php front-end)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Mplsviewer
